verses.verse: Thinkest <S%H2803><s%> thou <S%H2063>this<s%> to be <S%H4941>right,<s%> that thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is more than <S%H4480>God's?<s%> <S%H410><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H559>saidst,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be unto thee? and, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3276>profit<s%> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my <S%H4480>sin?<s%> <S%H2403><s%>
I <S%H589><s%> will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H4405><s%> thee, and thy <S%H7453>companions<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.
Look <S%H5027><s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> and <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> which are <S%H1361>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> thou.

If <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H2398>sinnest,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6466>doest<s%> thou against him? or if thy <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> be <S%H7231>multiplied,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> thou unto him?
If <S%H518><s%> thou be <S%H6663>righteous,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5414>givest<s%> thou him? <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H3947>receiveth<s%> he of thine <S%H4480>hand?<s%> <S%H3027><s%>
Thy <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> may hurt a <S%H376>man<s%> as <S%H3644>thou<s%> art; and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> may profit the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man.<s%>

By reason of the <S%H4480>multitude<s%> <S%H7230><s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they make the oppressed to <S%H2199>cry:<s%> they cry <S%H7768>out<s%> by reason of the <S%H4480>arm<s%> <S%H2220><s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty.<s%>
But <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H559>saith,<s%> <S%H346>Where<s%> is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>maker,<s%> who <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night;<s%>
Who <S%H502>teacheth<s%> us more than the <S%H4480>beasts<s%> <S%H929><s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and maketh us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than the <S%H4480>fowls<s%> <S%H5775><s%> of <S%H8064>heaven?<s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> they <S%H6817>cry,<s%> but <S%H3808>none<s%> giveth <S%H6030>answer,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men.<s%>

Although <S%H637><s%> <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7789>see<s%> him, yet <S%H1779>judgment<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> him; therefore <S%H2342>trust<s%> thou in him.

But <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> it is <S%H369>not<s%> so, he hath <S%H6485>visited<s%> in his <S%H639>anger;<s%> yet he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> extremity: <S%H6580><s%>
